Text: Take this!!!
Graaa...agh...!
It's healing...but it looks like it's in pain!
...In that case!
I'll hit it with a bunch of deadly strikes!
Woooshrrraaahhh!!!
Thought you could escape my claws?!
Just die, you weakling!
Gaaaaaahhh...
Yesss...
...I did it! I hunted down a dragon!
Now I'm also a dragon slayer, just like Boss man!
Alright then, let's taste the prey's fleshâ€•
Ewwww?! What's this?! It smells terrible!

Eww... I've never smelled anything this bad...
It's worse than rotten boar meat!

If I bring this back, Lady Alpha will definitely get
mad at me! It looks unappetizing too. I'd better not
eat any...

...Right! I'll go get praised by Boss man! I hunted
down a dragon! Woohoo!

Seriously... That girl never properly checks if her
prey is dead.

...But this time is an exception. As expected,
dragons can't be killed by normal means...!

And why did Sergey regularly come to this remote
location in Madlid to subdue Malak...?

I thought seeing the actual thing might lead to some
insights, but things don't always work out that
conveniently...

...That said, Delta really has become stronger. In
terms of sheer combat strength, she must have
surpassed me by now!

Just like Shadow Wisdom says, "If you love your
child, send her out into the world."
Grrrrrrr!!!
...*inhales*!!!
*inhales*...
Uwaaaghh!!!
...Hup.
Gyaahhh!!!
...Whew.

U-Ughh... Boss man...you really are strong at arm
wrestling!
You still have much, much more training to do.

Ha-ruff! But I learned a way to exert a bunch of
strength!

(...That's probably true. Delta's inhuman strength
has increased dramatically these past few days.)

(I mean, until now, she wasn't all that conscious
about breathing at the right timing to exert force.)

(Proper inhaling, storing the air in her lower
abdomen, and exhaling before impact... It
seems she picked up on this and is showing
significant growth.)

(Honestly, it was hard keeping a cool face without
getting breathless or breaking the tableâ€”all while
still winning one-sidedly...!)

I hunted down a dragon, but I still have lots to
learn...

Even as a dragon slayer, your days of hunting
continue. Don't let yourself get carried away
just because you did good, Delta.

I did good? You got it, Boss man! I won't let myself
get carried away!

(...For starters, before even getting into the
proper way to work out, there are plenty of
other things Delta needs to learn firstâ€•)
Oh right! Boss man! I brought back a souvenir!
A souvenir?
Yes, here!
...A dirt-covered, white lump...
It's a mushroom! I found it buried in the ground!
A mushroom...from the ground...

(Wait a minute! That means, this white object must
be a...!)

(...I knew it! A white truffle! Also treasured in
this world as a "white diamond"!)

(This is supposed to be a delicacy that's hard for
humans to find, but dogs are good at sniffing it
out from the ground!)
Boss man...?
Delta. Where did you find this mushroom...?

Huh? Umm... I was hunting Malak near the cape...
so in the nearby forest!
In the forest of Madlid...!

(I can faintly sense natural magic from this white
truffle.)

(Meaning, if I fine-tune my senses for magic
detection, I can find it without having Delta
digging up the ground!)
...Were there a lot of these mushrooms?
Yes! There seemed to be a lot!

(...This smells like a fortune in the making! Even
at 1,000 zeni per gram, 100 kilos is 100 million
zeni!)

(If I can continuously bring in an income like that,
my shadowbroker coffers will be even more abundant!)

(...Although, there's no knowing whether we can
actually collect such a large amount, and how to
sell them is another hurdleâ€•)

(I'll worry about that in future. For now, let's
start with a field survey! Even just having the
intel can prove useful down the line!)
Let's go hunting...in Madlid!
Whoa! Are you going dragon hunting?

(Now, the question is, how to justify the second son
of a rural aristocratic family from Midgard Kingdom,
Cid Kagenou, visiting that remote area of Velgalta...)

(Even if I full-on sprint there and back, I'll still
need two whole days. Being absent from home
for that long is a fatal mistake for a side
character...but...)
I don't want to miss this hunting opportunity!

Then, I'll teach you how to hunt dragons! You need
to break them apart and land lots of hits!
Right...and I'm just about to hit the motherlode!
